configboolean.name: mailboxarray
configboolean.desc: Should we run a custom function in which array elements can be added to use in the template file, while processing the message lists? If so, make sure you define _dimp_hook_mailboxarray() in config/hooks.php. The elements will be available as template tags in the dimp/templates/imp/mailbox.html template file.

configboolean.name: previewview
configboolean.desc: Should we run a custom function in which array elements can be modified, and javascript code be provided to dynamically update page elements in the preview pane? If so, make sure you define _dimp_hook_previewview() in config/hooks.php. The sample documentation in that file can better explain what can be accomplished with this hook.

configboolean.name: messageview
configboolean.desc: Should we run a custom function in which array elements can be added to use in the template file, while displaying the message text? If so, make sure you define _dimp_hook_messageview() in config/hooks.php. The elements will be available as template tags in the dimp/templates/imp/message.html template file.

configboolean.name: addressformatting
configboolean.desc: Should we run a custom function that is used to format email addresses in message headers? If so, make sure you define _dimp_hook_addressformatting() in config/hooks.php.

configboolean.name: msglist_format
configboolean.desc: Should we use a custom function to provide additional information/custom formatting of messages in the mailbox message list? If so, make sure you define _dimp_hook_msglist_format() in config/hooks.php.

configlist.name: css_files
configlist.desc: A list of additional CSS files to load from the dimp/themes/ directory.

configboolean.name: debug
configboolean.desc: Turn on javascript debugging? Will cause popup alert windows to appear on various errors. This should be turned off for all production servers.

configinteger.name: buffer_pages
configinteger.desc: The number of viewable pages to send to the browser per server access when listing messages.

configinteger.name: limit_factor
configinteger.desc: When browsing through a message list, if a user comes within this percentage of the end of the current cached viewport, the browser will send a background request to the server to retrieve the next slice of the message list.

configinteger.name: viewport_wait
configinteger.desc: How long, in seconds, to wait before displaying an informational message to users that the message list is still being built. Set to 0 to disable messages.

configboolean.name: background_inbox
configboolean.desc: On initial login to the portal page, load the INBOX in the background?

configboolean.name: search_all
configboolean.desc: Allow user to search all mailboxes at a single time? Unless your mail server is optimized to perform searches, enabling this can cause massive server load if a user has a large mailbox.

configmultienum.name: apps
configmultienum.desc: Select any applications that should be linked in DIMP's menu
